document.forum_title: San Francisco Chronicle - Bay Area news, sports, tech, food - San Francisco Chronicle
document.discussion_title: Rio Olympics’ iconic moments will endure over ironic, idiotic
document.topic_text: Photo: Matt Dunham, Associated Press Gymnast Simone Biles (center) carries the U.S. flag during the Closing Ceremony of the Summer Olympics in Maracana Stadium in Rio de Janeiro. Gymnast Simone Biles (center) carries the U.S. flag during the... RIO DE JANEIRO — Having helped carry the women of USA Gymnastics to a record-breaking performance, Simone Biles closed the 2016 Summer Olympics by carrying the Stars and Stripes into rainy, windy Maracana Stadium, wrapping up a memorable month in the life of a great American athlete.

Gymnast Simone Biles (center) carries the U.S. flag during the... RIO DE JANEIRO — Having helped carry the women of USA Gymnastics to a record-breaking performance, Simone Biles closed the 2016 Summer Olympics by carrying the Stars and Stripes into rainy, windy Maracana Stadium, wrapping up a memorable month in the life of a great American athlete.
